Contacts

Show Contact

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

contacts

/

{id}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/contacts/{id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

404

Copy

```
{
  "payload": {
    "additional_attributes": {
      "city": "<string>",
      "country": "<string>",
      "country_code": "<string>",
      "created_at_ip": "<string>"
    },
    "availability_status": "online",
    "email": "<string>",
    "id": 123,
    "name": "<string>",
    "phone_number": "<string>",
    "blocked": true,
    "identifier": "<string>",
    "thumbnail": "<string>",
    "custom_attributes": {},
    "last_activity_at": 123,
    "created_at": 123,
    "contact_inboxes": [\
      {\
        "source_id": "<string>",\
        "inbox": {\
          "id": 123,\
          "avatar_url": "<string>",\
          "channel_id": 123,\
          "name": "<string>",\
          "channel_type": "<string>",\
          "provider": "<string>"\
        }\
      }\
    ]
  }
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#parameter-id)

id

number

required

ID of the contact

#### Response

200

200403404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload)

payload

object

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-additional-attributes)

payload.additional\_attributes

object

The object containing additional attributes related to the contact

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-additional-attributes-city)

payload.additional\_attributes.city

string

City of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-additional-attributes-country)

payload.additional\_attributes.country

string

Country of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-additional-attributes-country-code)

payload.additional\_attributes.country\_code

string

Country code of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-additional-attributes-created-at-ip)

payload.additional\_attributes.created\_at\_ip

string

IP address when the contact was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-availability-status)

payload.availability\_status

enum<string>

Availability status of the contact

Available options:

`online`,

`offline`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-email)

payload.email

string \| null

The email address of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-id)

payload.id

integer

The ID of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-name)

payload.name

string

The name of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-phone-number)

payload.phone\_number

string \| null

The phone number of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-blocked)

payload.blocked

boolean

Whether the contact is blocked

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-identifier)

payload.identifier

string \| null

The identifier of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-thumbnail)

payload.thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-custom-attributes)

payload.custom\_attributes

object

The custom attributes of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-last-activity-at)

payload.last\_activity\_at

integer \| null

Timestamp of last activity

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-created-at)

payload.created\_at

integer

Timestamp when contact was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-payload-contact-inboxes)

payload.contact\_inboxes

object\[\]

List of inboxes associated with this contact

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

Source identifier for the contact inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-inbox)

inbox

object

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-inbox-id)

inbox.id

integer

ID of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-inbox-avatar-url)

inbox.avatar\_url

string

URL for the inbox avatar

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-inbox-channel-id)

inbox.channel\_id

integer

ID of the channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-inbox-name)

inbox.name

string

Name of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-inbox-channel-type)

inbox.channel\_type

string

Type of channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/show-contact#response-inbox-provider)

inbox.provider

string \| null

Provider of the inbox
